VoiceList.Entry: “No…that tickles…”
“No…Stop…”
“Mr. Dolphin…”
Priscilla “Who are you?”
“At least knock when you enter a lady's room!”
Priscilla “Lifestream?”
“Yeah,I know! It's Mr. Dolphin's playground.”
“There's a Three-taloned island south of the continent. I heard the Lifestream runs below that island.”
“But why are you asking about the Lifestream?”
Priscilla “Huh,Cloud!?”
“Hurry up and help him!! He's very important to me.”
Priscilla “Cloud!!”
“Stupid jerk! Look how much you made me worry!! Were you at the Lifestream?”
Priscilla “You've gotta be more careful! Because you're going to marry me one day.”
Priscilla “I'm so happy!! Someday I'm going to be Cloud's wife.”
Priscilla “I've decided I'm gonna be Cloud's wife.”
Cloud “Yeah,that's right.”
Tifa “Cloud fell into the Lifestream at the North Cave,and has been missing ever since.”
Cid “We found Cloud!”
“You cannot take on any more Materia. Please discard some Materia.”
